mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Middleton, Henry, 1770-1846
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Saw him in Philadelphia two years ago - is visiting Europe and may go as far as Petersburg and Constantinople - from Major [Thomas] Pinckney, minister to London, he expects letters to men in the diplomatic line - will appreciate any that Jefferson may write for him - may be sent to Pinckney or to Edward Rutledge in South Carolina.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rutledge, Edward, 1749-1800
Pinckney, Thomas, 1750-1828
Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1792 June 1, Charleston, South Carolina to Thomas Jefferson, n.p.
